name: WireGraph
description:
Currently early in development.

WireGraph is a work-in-progress project, it is inspired by the designs of modular/semi-modular synthesizers such as VCV Rack and Voltage Modular.

I'm not entirely sure which direction to take this, but for now I just want to make a solid foundation for whatever I end up deciding.

Controls:

RMB - Remove the connection under the cursor.

R - Remove all connections

I'll probably clean up the code and release it as a base for others to build upon, in the form of a plugin. I'll include a set of example nodes to use and learn from as well.
